text: “ Westworld ” star Evan Rachel Wood, “ Star Wars : The Last Jedi ’ s ” Kelly Marie Tran, and Tony - nominated actress Da ’ Vine Joy Randolph play a darker version of the classic character guessing game Guess Who? in a new Funny or Die video. The # MeToo edition of the game finds the actresses trying to guess the Hollywood or media power player accused of sexual misconduct. Bill Cosby, Harvey Weinstein, Kevin Spacey, Matt Lauer, Louis C. K., Terry Richardson, and Mario Batali are a few of the familiar faces on the game board. “ Did your person prey on men? ” Wood asks. “ Not this time, ” Tran responds.
